archimate:BusinessFunction.name: System Analysis
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.6.1] The purpose of the System Analysis process is to provide a rigorous basis of data and information for technical understanding to aid decision‐making across the life cycle.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 74

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.6.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Systemanalyse" besteht darin, eine klare Grundlage an Daten und Informationen für das technische Verständnis zu schaffen, die als Entscheidungshilfe über den ganzen Lebenszyklus dient".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.6.1] The purpose of the System Analysis process is to provide a rigorous basis of data and information for technical understanding to aid decision‐making across the life cycle.
